title: 2019 Adversarial Collaboration Entries
summary:
Key ideas
- Adversarial collaboration contest where people with opposing views collaborate to present a united summary of evidence and implications 
- Eight teams submitted collaborations for the 2019 contest covering topics such as infant circumcision, eating meat, calorie restriction, and gene editing technologies 
- Winners will receive $2500 in prize money 

Key learnings
- Adversarial collaboration is a good way to make sure you hear the strongest arguments and counterarguments for both sides on a controversial issue 

Key questions
- None mentioned in this portion of the blog post
